abstract: Maveron, a venture capital firm co-founded by Starbucks chairman Howard D. Schultz, led a $16 million funding round for beverage maker NextFoods.
lead_paragraph: Maveron, a venture capital firm co-founded by Starbucks chairman Howard D. Schultz, led a $16 million funding round for beverage maker NextFoods.

headline.main: Drink Maker Gets Infusion From Maveron
